channel.title: [PI] Potions For Donators & Falador PVP Area [PI]
channel.description:
Well in my new spawn server, I have 2 problems then its done 100%.
I just made overloads, and need them to be donator to drink.
And I need t make falador a pvp area.

item.title: [PI] Potions For Donators & Falador PVP Area [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Whrithlin Whrithlin
item.description:
@Whrithlin wrote:

I’m not an expert on Pi, but it sounds like you need to find where it handles items (like an itemHandler), find case (overload id) and put whatever is there in an if statement saying playerRights needs to be equal to donator, which is probably 1.

For the Falador park, you would need to find your wilderness variable and put in Fally park’s coordinates.

Read full topic
